frozen.name: snes9x-gtk
frozen.shortDescription: a portable, freeware Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) emulator
frozen.longDescription: Snes9x is a portable, freeware Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) emulator. It basically allows you to play most games designed for the SNES and Super Famicom Nintendo game systems on your PC or Workstation; which includes some real gems that were only ever released in Japan.
